case.title: Happy Hour (Greenwich Village)
case.text:
Looking to meet new people for a drink. I live and work in the city.
More about me: driven, intelligent, independent, sophisticated, outgoing, cultured. i love to dance, read, and travel. ooh, i consider myself a foodie. You: intelligent, honest, good heart, outgoing, confident, cultured, funny, driven, and cool. age: 29-39
